item.description:
Over 20,000,000 bought the book, and now it is a movie!

You can see The Celestine Prophecy at a special preview with showings at 4:30 and 7:00. From 1 to 3:30 you will have the opportunity to receive a massage, Reiki treatment or have a reading, $10.00 per session of ten minutes. Following each showing of the movie, there will be a discussion group.

Seating is limited! You can order your ticket by sending a self-addressed envelope to A Place of Light, 374 Main Street, Cherry Valley, MA 01611. Please indicate which showing you wish to see!

see ya at the movies!

susan gale

For more information, see http://thecelestinepr...
item.name: Come see the movie, The Celestine Prophecy!
